video_prompt: Golden dust particles softly swirl and drift within the vortex, subtly changing their density and flow. The man's bow tie slightly shifts as if with a shallow breath. The light from the swirling center subtly pulsates with a soft, warm glow, casting fainter, shimmering reflections on his suit jacket. A very subtle slow zoom out reveals more of the surrounding specks of light in the darkness.
image_prompt: A full-body shot of a suave man dressed in a black suit with a bow tie, holding a pistol in his right hand. He stands with a pensive expression, looking slightly to his right. The background features a large, bright, spiraling golden vortex with an intensely bright yellow center, creating a dynamic and ethereal atmosphere. The overall color palette is dominated by deep blacks, golden yellows, and hints of sparkling light within the vortex. The texture of the vortex appears to be composed of fine, luminous particles against a dark, starry backdrop. The man is perfectly centered and occupies the lower half of the frame, silhouetted against the bright background while still showing details of his attire and expression. The lighting emanates from the vortex, casting dramatic shadows and highlights on the man. The style is hyper-realistic with an artistic, somewhat dramatic flair.
refined_video_prompt: Golden dust swirls, subtle density shifts. Bow tie subtly twitches. Center light pulsates, suit reflections shimmer faintly. Slow zoom reveals more drifting specks.
creative_video_prompt_1: Golden dust violently explodes from the vortex, forming sharp, crackling tendrils that whip around the man. The man's bow tie aggressively tightens, his suit rippling, as if anticipating a sudden lunge. The swirling center pulses with furious, strobing bursts of light, casting stark, distorted shadows that writhe on his figure. The entire scene rapidly zooms out revealing a maelstrom of light, as particles collide, coalesce and burst.
creative_video_prompt_2: Golden dust particles congeal into impossibly sharp geometric forms, then reverse their motion, spiraling inwards to form impossible voids. The man's bow tie unravels and reforms as liquid light, while his suit jacket shimmers with reflections of non-existent spectrums. His shadow detaches and dances independently, subtly stretching and contracting through an unseen, shifting dimension, as tiny distant stars ripple like water, defying stellar mechanics.
creative_video_prompt_3: A slow, dramatic zoom out from the man's intense gaze, revealing more of the golden, swirling vortex. As the light pulsates gently, the golden dust particles softly swirl, catching fainter shimmer reflections on his suit jacket. The camera subtly pans down to reveal his hand clutching a gun, then slowly glides up as the bow tie twitches with a shallow breath, heightening the mystery.
